title: Transport Management in the UK: Ports and Airlines
headline: This online course outlines key information about air transport management and operation of ports and airlines in the UK
description: This free online air transport management course first outlines the types of international and domestic ports and the services that they offer. Next, learn about the British water freight industry. Finally, learn about air transport management and operation of British airports, flight operations, crew rostering, and maintenance management. This is valuable information for anyone interested in air transport management, so get started today.

courseDescription:
This free online air transport management course will begin by examining the types of international and domestic ports and their services. You will learn about the national and international organisations involved with ocean freight shipping and the correct documentation required for international freight shipping. Then, the air transport management course will describe the inland waterway system in the UK, and outline both its stakeholders and the benefits of inland water freight.

There are a number of similarities between the role of the air transport manager in both the passenger and freight airline industry. This air transport management course will make it clear where the information provided applies to both sectors, or just to one of them. Next, you will hear about the UK aviation stakeholders and different types of passenger flights, specifically, the flight operations that a manager is responsible for in air transport management.

Finally, you will learn about route planning and the regulations covering air freight transport management in the UK. By the end of the air transport management course, you will have a strong understanding of what role air transport management plays in terms of ports and airlines. You will also be ready to take your next steps should you be interested in pursuing air transport management as a career path. So don't delay, start learning about air transport management now.
